recipesJson.name: Stuffed
recipesJson.author: Deweysuds
recipesJson.description: Stawberry cheesecake stuffed crepe.  Originally wanted to do a 123 cheesecake stuffed crepe, but the fruit notes in the WF crepe was throwing it off.  I added the shisha strawberry and it brought it all together.  The zeppola is added to give the crepe a little backing and give sweetness to the mix.
